ComicInfo.Title: The Cracks Beneath Your Feet Part Three
ComicInfo.Summary:
Time is running out! Orion Pax, his friends, and the Autobot security forces have to get a grip on their murder investigations as their superior, Sentinel Prime, makes his return to Cybertron!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Umi Miyao | 1-2 | B | Cover B | Priscilla Tramontano | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Guido Guidi | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-26 03:21:12. [CVDB713736]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Guido Guidi, Priscilla Tramontano, Umi Miyao
ComicInfo.Genre: Science Fiction, Robots, Cyborgs & Mecha, Action/Adventure, Movies & TV
ComicInfo.Characters: Barricade, Bumblebee, Chromia, Elita-One, Flamewar, Geomotus, Prowl, Shadow Stalker, Sideswipe, Sixshot, Windblade
